newsitem.title: CHINA: China Textile reverses losses in 1996.
newsitem.headline: China Textile reverses losses in 1996.

text.p: China Textile Machinery Co Ltd reversed 1995 losses to register a net profit for 1996 due to increased sales of a key product, shuttleless looms, the company said in a statement on Tuesday.

The company's 1996 net profit was 3.941 million yuan compared with losses of 73.438 million yuan for 1995 based on international accounting standards, said the company statement, which was published in the Shanghai Securities News.
"Though 1996 was a difficult year for our company, we still saw a recovery after shifting production to advanced shuttleless looms," the company statement said.
"We sold 3,388 shuttleless loom units in 1996, up from 1,020 units in 1995," a company spokesman said.
Revenue from shuttleless looms reached 172.662 million yuan in 1996, accounting for 78.35 percent of the company's total sales, the statement said.
